description.positive: We deliver great stuff! We're proud of it and our stakeholders are really happy.
description.negative: We do not deliver value to our stakeholders. We feel ashamed of our work.

description.positive: We always get great support and help when we ask for it which keeps us going.
description.negative: We keep getting stuck because we can't get the help and support that we need.

description.positive: We are a totally gelled super-team with awesome collaboration and alignment.
description.negative: We are a bunch of individuals that do not know what others in the squad are doing.
